alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. Johns County through 830 AM EST... At 800 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Picolata, or 8 miles southeast of Green Cove Springs, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, World Golf Village, Saint Augustine Beach, South Ponte Vedra, Vilano Beach, Guana River State Park, Saint Augustine South, Anastasia, Bakersville and South Ponte Vedra Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns
